name: We Need More Sheep
description:
We Need More Sheep is a tower-defence-kind-of-game where you pack on sheep to keep your village alive. Protect the sheep from foxes with hunters, and stay alive for as long as you can!

P.S. The game gets harder as you progress.

P.P.S Due to a minor bug, the title music currently plays right after you hit play . We'll hopefully fix this soon. In the meantime, make sure to not miss out on those tunes.

Use the in-game tutorial by pressing "Help" in the pause screen if you get stuck.

Credits:

Programming - Mock-Angel and ZaherHa

Original Music and SFX - notefez

Additional SFX from ZapSplat

Sprites (except the glamorous Wool Sprite™) from IconFinder or OpenGameArt

Part of the Quarantine Jam 2020
